price: 80. Wahai Bani Israil! Sungguh, Kami telah menyelamatkan kamu dari musuhmu, dan Kami telah mengadakan perjanjian dengan kamu (untuk bermunajat) di sebelah kanan gunung itu (gunung Sinai) dan Kami telah menurunkan kepada kamu mann dan salwā.
arabic: يَٰبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ قَدۡ أَنجَيۡنَٰكُم مِّنۡ عَدُوِّكُمۡ وَوَٰعَدۡنَٰكُمۡ جَانِبَ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلۡأَيۡمَنَ وَنَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡمَنَّ وَٱلسَّلۡوَىٰ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yābanī is'rāīla qad anjaynākum min ʿaduwwikum wawāʿadnākum jāniba al-ṭūri al-aymana wanazzalnā ʿalaykumu al-mana wal-salwā
translations: and We made a covenant with you
